roleset.name: shake with rapid slight motion
roleset.note: QUIVER-V NOTES: Frames file for 'quiver' based on sentences in brown. (from quiver.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: adjectival
example.text: By comparison, Fritzie and Laura Andrus were quivering fledglings.

example.name: verbal
example.text: They were about a mile off; under me the ground quivered slightly.
